Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [G C G D]
VERSE 1: There's no [G]deed that can redeem us There's no rite, no [Em]magic [D]word Only [G]by the work of Jesus Can salvation [Em]be se[D]cured
CHORUS: It is [C]finished! He has [G]done it! Let your [Em]weary [D]heart [C]rejoice Our [C]redemption is [G]accomplished Raise a [Em]shout with [D]ragged [C]voice And go [Am]bravely into [G]battle Knowing [Em]he has [D]won the [C]war It is [Em]finished, [D]lift your [C]head And [D]weep no [G]more [C G D G C G D]
VERSE 2: There's no [G]sacrifice to offer There's no penance [Em]to [D]complete Freely [G]drink of living water Without money [Em]come and [D]feast
{new_page} CHORUS/Bridge: It is [C]finished! He has [G]done it! Let your [Em]weary [D]heart [C]rejoice Our [C]redemption is [G]accomplished Raise a [Em]shout with [D]ragged [C]voice And go [Am]bravely into [G]battle Knowing [Em]he has [D]won the [C]war It is [Em]finished, [D]lift your [C]head Let every [Em D/F#]sinner [G C]rejoice Hear the [G]dying victor's [D]cry [Em]Raise [D/F#]up [G]your [C]voice Sing it [G]out through earth and [D]sky
CHORUS: It is [C]finished! He has [G]done it! Let your [Em]weary [D]heart [C]rejoice Our [C]redemption is [G]accomplished Raise a [Em]shout with [D]ragged [C]voice And go [Am]bravely into [G]battle Knowing [Em]he has [D]won the [C]war It is [Em]finished, [D]lift your [C]head And [D]weep no [G C G D :| 3X G ]more
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 theres no deed that can redeem us theres no rite no magic word only by the work of jesus can salvation be secured chorus it is finished he has done it let your weary heart rejoice our redemption is accomplished raise a shout with ragged voice and go bravely into battle knowing he has won the war it is finished lift your head and weep no more verse 2 theres no sacrifice to offer theres no penance to complete freely drink of living water without money come and feast chorusbridge it is finished he has done it let your weary heart rejoice our redemption is accomplished raise a shout with ragged voice and go bravely into battle knowing he has won the war it is finished lift your head let every sinner rejoice hear the dying victors cry raise up your voice sing it out through earth and sky chorus it is finished he has done it let your weary heart rejoice our redemption is accomplished raise a shout with ragged voice and go bravely into battle knowing he has won the war it is finished lift your head and weep no more
